Onmyoji:Menreiki.NAME: Onmyoji:Menreiki
Onmyoji:Menreiki.DESCRIPTION: Kami HP !M!. On enter change to one of 4 side. Each side is treated as a different kami.

Onmyoji:Seven Sides.NAME: Onmyoji:Seven Sides
Onmyoji:Seven Sides.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Increase !M! damage for each different kami in this battle.
